children.description: And open Edit App Page for the first application
When clear field {Application name} on Edit App Page
And enter to the field {Application name} value {mamax-Appdf}
And save changes on Edit App Page
And the message {App Updated!} is displayed
And open Details tab on the application
Then {Application Name} have been applied on Edit App Page with value {mamax-Appdf}

testSteps.description: (Pantheon|Edit App) Edit app positive [2.1.8 Edit application] #2: {appFormField=Redirect URI, appValue=https://oauth.ticketmaster.com, detailName=Callback URL}

children.description: And navigate to Pantheon LogIn page from Home page
And navigate to Pantheon User Account page from LogIn page
And open Edit App Page for the first application
When clear field {Redirect URI} on Edit App Page
And enter to the field {Redirect URI} value {https://oauth.ticketmaster.com}
And save changes on Edit App Page
And the message {App Updated!} is displayed
Check if message is displayed: App Updated!
And open Details tab on the application
Then {Callback URL} have been applied on Edit App Page with value {https://oauth.ticketmaster.com}
Check if changes are applied: Callback URL, https://oauth.ticketmaster.com

userStory.narrative:
In order to manage my Apps
As a user of Ticket Master Developer portal
I want to perform CRUD operations with my apps
